transforms.name: vite:vue
vite:css
transforms.result: .body{font-family:Gentium Basic,serif}.hero{height:675px;width:100%}@media screen and (max-device-width:640px){.hero{height:100vh}}.main-banner{background-image:url(__VITE_ASSET__V2m4k8q2__);background-position:50%;background-repeat:no-repeat;background-size:cover;height:100%}.owl-item{-webkit-backface-visibility:hidden;float:left;min-height:1px;-webkit-touch-callout:none;width:100%;-webkit-tap-highlight-color:transparent;position:relative;top:50%}.single-slide{background-position:50%;background-repeat:no-repeat;background-size:cover;height:100%}.slider-overlay{background-color:#262626;height:100%;position:absolute;top:0;width:100%;z-index:1}.slider-text{left:0;position:relative;right:0;top:50%;top:55%;transform:translateY(-50%);z-index:2}.slider-wraper{overflow:hidden;position:relative;text-align:left;z-index:999}.slider-text h1{color:#fff}.fadeInLeft{animation-name:fadeInLeft}.animated{animation-duration:1s;animation-fill-mode:both}h1{color:#262626;font-weight:600;margin:0 0 20px}.slider-wraper p{color:#fff;font-size:2rem;font-weight:400}ul{list-style:none outside none;margin:0;padding:0}.slider-text li{display:inline-block}element.style{opacity:1}.owl-carousel .animated{animation-duration:1s;animation-fill-mode:both}.slider-text li a{border:1px solid #846644;-o-border-image:initial;border-image:initial;color:#fff;display:inline-block;font-weight:700;margin-top:8px;padding:12px 36px;text-decoration:none;text-transform:uppercase}.slider-text li:last-child a{background:#846644 none repeat scroll 0 0;color:#fff}h1 span{color:#846644}.slider-text li:last-child a:hover{background:#fff none repeat scroll 0 0;color:#262626;transition:all .4s ease 0s}.hero-text{font-size:5rem;font-weight:600;line-height:1.1;margin-bottom:.5rem}.base-line-text{font-size:2rem;font-weight:400}
